A

add(tag, entry) - Method in class com.udeyrishi.pipe.repository.InMemoryRepository
Adds the entry to the repository under the given tag. Uses the entry's Identifiable.getUuid for indexing.

Adds the entry to the repository under the given tag. Uses the entry's Identifiable.getUuid for indexing.
addCountedBarrier(name, capacity, attempts, onBarrierLiftedAction) - Method in class com.udeyrishi.pipe.PipelineBuilder
Adds a counted barrier in the pipeline. A handle to the corresponding interface CountedBarrierController can be retrieved once the pipeline is created via Pipeline.getCountedBarriers::get(i).
addManualBarrier(name) - Method in class com.udeyrishi.pipe.PipelineBuilder
Adds a manual barrier in the pipeline. A handle to the corresponding interface ManualBarrierController can be retrieved once the pipeline is created via Pipeline.getManualBarriers::get(i).

J

Job<T> - Class in com.udeyrishi.pipe
Represents a chunk of work that is being processed in a pipeline. When an item gets pushed into a pipeline, the pipeline returns a class Job to track its progress.

L

lift() - Method in interface com.udeyrishi.pipe.ManualBarrierController
Lifts the barrier.
liftWhen($receiver, periodicityMillis, pollingDispatcher, condition) - Static method in class com.udeyrishi.pipe.util.BarrierExtensionsKt
A utility extension function that can be used to automatically lift a interface ManualBarrierController when a certain condition is a met. The condition will be evaluated every periodicityMillis milliseconds on a coroutine allowed by the pollingDispatcher.
liftWhenHasInternet($receiver, app) - Static method in class com.udeyrishi.pipe.util.BarrierExtensionsKt
A utility extension function that be used to lift a barrier when internet is available. It can be used in front of the steps that require internet access.
Logger - Interface in com.udeyrishi.pipe.util
An abstract logger that can be used for monitoring important events in the pipelines.

M

ManualBarrierController - Interface in com.udeyrishi.pipe
A simple barrier controller that lifts the barrier when ManualBarrierController.lift is called.
MutableRepository<T extends Identifiable> - Interface in com.udeyrishi.pipe.repository
Extends interface Repository by adding mutability to it. Implementations must be thread-safe.

O

onFailure$module(cause) - Method in class com.udeyrishi.pipe.Running.AttemptFailed
Should be called when the step has ran out of attempts. Ticks to class Terminal.Failure.
onFailure$module(cause) - Method in class com.udeyrishi.pipe.Running.Attempting
Marks the step as failed, ticking it to class Running.AttemptFailed.
onFailure$module(cause) - Method in class com.udeyrishi.pipe.Running.AttemptSuccessful
Should be called if the job was interrupted after the step was successfully completed. Ticks to class Terminal.Failure.
onFailure$module(cause) - Method in class com.udeyrishi.pipe.State.Scheduled
Can be called if the job is interrupted while it was still scheduled. Ticks to class Terminal.Failure.
onFailure$module(cause) - Method in class com.udeyrishi.pipe.Terminal.Failure
Usually, this should never be needed. But can optionally be called if more unexpected errors are encountered after the job has already failed. Ticks back to the class Terminal.Failure state, however, replaces the cause with the new one.
onFailure$module(cause) - Method in class com.udeyrishi.pipe.Terminal.Success
Should ideally never be needed. But can optionally be used to mark any unexpected errors after the success state. Ticks to class Terminal.Failure.
onInternalPipeError(throwable) - Method in interface com.udeyrishi.pipe.PipelineDispatcher
A fallback handler that will be invoked if there are any unexpected exceptions in pipe. This does not include actual logical errors that can be safely thrown in the different steps. This is only for safely dealing with bugs in the pipe project.
onSuccess$module(nextStep) - Method in class com.udeyrishi.pipe.Running.AttemptFailed
Ticks the state to the next state, given the current one was successful.
onSuccess$module(nextStep) - Method in class com.udeyrishi.pipe.Running.Attempting
Marks the step as successful, ticking it to class Running.AttemptSuccessful.
onSuccess$module(nextStep) - Method in class com.udeyrishi.pipe.Running.AttemptSuccessful
If nextStep, ticks to class Running.Attempting state for the next step. Else, treats this as end-of-pipeline, and ticks to class Terminal.Success
onSuccess$module(nextStep) - Method in class com.udeyrishi.pipe.State.Scheduled
Ticks to class Running.Attempting if nextStep is provided. Else, treats it as the end-of-pipeline, and ticks to class Terminal.Success.
onSuccess$module(nextStep) - Method in class com.udeyrishi.pipe.Terminal.Failure
Should never be called. A failed job can never go through a success transition.
onSuccess$module(nextStep) - Method in class com.udeyrishi.pipe.Terminal.Success
Usually, this should never be called. Calling it with a null nextStep is a no-op.

P

Pipeline<T> - Interface in com.udeyrishi.pipe
A pipeline is a sequence of steps (and barriers, optionally) used to convert an input to an output.
PipelineBuilder<T> - Class in com.udeyrishi.pipe
A builder class for constructing pipelines.
PipelineBuilder() - Constructor for class com.udeyrishi.pipe.PipelineBuilder
A builder class for constructing pipelines.
PipelineDispatcher - Interface in com.udeyrishi.pipe
Represents a dispatcher that will be used to start all pipe coroutines. This dispatcher is converted into an effective kotlin.coroutines.CoroutineContext by joining the PipelineDispatcher.getCoroutineDispatcher and the PipelineDispatcher.onInternalPipeError implementation.
PipelineDispatcherKt - Class in com.udeyrishi.pipe
 
PipelineKt - Class in com.udeyrishi.pipe
 
push(input, tag) - Method in interface com.udeyrishi.pipe.Pipeline
Pushes an input into the pipeline. Returns the class Job that can be used for monitoring the flow of this input through the pipeline.

Running.Attempting - Class in com.udeyrishi.pipe
Represents a job that is attempting a step.
Running.AttemptSuccessful - Class in com.udeyrishi.pipe

S

setCapacity(capacity) - Method in interface com.udeyrishi.pipe.CountedBarrierController
Updates the barrier's capacity.
setDispatcher(dispatcher) - Method in class com.udeyrishi.pipe.PipelineBuilder
Sets the dispatcher that this pipeline will use. Uses the Dispatchers.IO coroutine dispatcher by default, and converts it to a pipe-compatible dispatcher via PipelineDispatcherKt.toStrictAndroidPipeDispatcher.
setLogger(logger) - Method in class com.udeyrishi.pipe.PipelineBuilder
Sets an optional logger that will log all the important state transitions happening in all the jobs. AndroidLogger should be appropriate for most cases.
setRepository(repository) - Method in class com.udeyrishi.pipe.PipelineBuilder
Sets the repository that the pipeline will use for tracking the ongoing uploads. Uses an class InMemoryRepository by default.
State - Class in com.udeyrishi.pipe
Represents the state machine that all pipe jobs follow.
State.Running - Class in com.udeyrishi.pipe
Represents a job that is running.
State.Scheduled - Class in com.udeyrishi.pipe
Represents a job that has been scheduled, but hasn't been started yet.
State.Terminal - Class in com.udeyrishi.pipe
Represents a job that has finished running.
Step - Class in com.udeyrishi.pipe
 

T

Terminal.Failure - Class in com.udeyrishi.pipe
Represents a job that failed.
Terminal.Success - Class in com.udeyrishi.pipe

toStrictAndroidPipeDispatcher($receiver) - Static method in class com.udeyrishi.pipe.PipelineDispatcherKt
Converts a CoroutineDispatcher to a interface PipelineDispatcher, such that any unhandled exceptions are thrown on the Android UI thread.
